previewText: Abbi Crutchfield: I’m bringing a special guest tonight.
title: Brian Becomes An Adult!

previewText: Toni Cruz: Party is getting started. Come on by when you can.
title: Thunder Buddies

previewText: Tony Cruz: Ya I’ll be there. I get off of work at 6pm so I might be a little late.
title: Brad, Jim, & Tony

previewText: Jessica Valenti: Location has been updated. See everyone at 8pm!
title: PARTY TIME!!!

previewText: That may be the funniest text I’ve ever gotten from you out of the blue!
title: Joel Flory
